title: Coordinate an Inter-Terminal Transfer
description: A container was discharged at Terminal A but needs to be loaded onto a vessel at Terminal B. A transfer must be arranged.

tasks.description: Receive a request to move a container from Terminal A to Terminal B.
tasks.expected_outcome: Planner receives the work order with the container ID and destination.

tasks.description: Create a job for a terminal tractor to pick up the container from its location in Terminal A.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order is created for a tractor to move the container.

tasks.description: Instruct the driver to exit Terminal A's gate and enter Terminal B's gate, and assign a destination yard slot in Terminal B.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates the necessary gate passes and a new yard location for the container, and the driver is given clear instructions.
